body:
What is Spack's plan for things that use X11?  

Is there interest/support for doing something like what [Linuxbrew did with homebrew-xorg](https://github.com/Linuxbrew/homebrew-xorg/blob/master/xorg.rb) or is the approach to depend on OS distributions, or ?

I see packages for _xproto_, _xorg-util-macros_, _libxshmfence_, and _dri2proto_.
title: Question: What are the plans for X11/xorg?
